attributes.action: take away the restrictions that stop the train companies reducing fares in off peak times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government restricts train companies
from cutting fares to diswade people from taking the train and encourages them to raise fares.The government do this is because they know the trains could not cope with the increase in passengers.There is an answer. 
LOW FARES LOW CONGESTION
NO FARES NO CONGESTION
